titleStmt.title: The Princes first fruits: or, A full and perfect relation of two victories obtained by Col. Rich his brigade, together with the forces under the command of Sir Michael Levesey, over some forces landed out of the revolted ships neer Sandown Castle, in the county of Kent, August 10. & 14. Together with a perfect list of the commanders, and officers taken prisoners, and the number of slain on both sides.
titleStmt.author: J. H.

titleStmt.title: The Princes first fruits: or, A full and perfect relation of two victories obtained by Col. Rich his brigade, together with the forces under the command of Sir Michael Levesey, over some forces landed out of the revolted ships neer Sandown Castle, in the county of Kent, August 10. & 14. Together with a perfect list of the commanders, and officers taken prisoners, and the number of slain on both sides.
titleStmt.author: J. H.
D. H.

notesStmt.note: Signed on A2r: Your affectionate brother, I.H.
With a letter on A4r signed: D.H.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
